meanings.definition: A person who does not eat meat.
meanings.sent1: Many vegetarians enjoy a plant-based diet.
meanings.sent2: Some vegetarians choose not to consume animal products.
meanings.sent3: The vegetarians at the party brought delicious veggie dishes.
meanings.sent4: In a world of meat-eaters, vegetarians stand out.
meanings.sent5: Vegetarians often have creative recipes using only plant-based ingredients.

meanings.sent1: The restaurant offers a variety of vegetarian options.
meanings.sent2: She follows a vegetarian lifestyle for ethical reasons.
meanings.sent3: The vegetarian community is growing in numbers.
meanings.sent4: His vegetarian beliefs influence his daily choices.
meanings.sent5: The vegetarian movement promotes sustainable living practices.
